mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `Member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{id};
